Here is an issue for [History Network Fully Operational Meta Tracking Issue #398](<https://github.com/ethereum/portal-network-specs/issues/398>)

All teams should read the issue, there is a call to action for teams to share `checklists` on tasks to complete in order to signal what they have left to work on or if they are ready for a fully live History Network
